abstract.p: Correction of April 26 article about proposal to promote skeptical scientific views of theory of global warming

block.p: An article on April 26 about a proposal to promote skeptical scientific views of the theory of global warming included an organization incorrectly among the proposal's advocates. The Science and Environmental Policy Project was invited to participate but declined, according to its spokeswoman, Candace Crandall. A spokesman for the American Petroleum Institute confirms that a memorandum by an employee, on which the article was based, identified Ms. Crandall incorrectly as a member of the committee that drafted the proposal.
